name: MoleMine: Dig 'til you drop
description:
Explore caves with your headlamp! Make sure to watch your battery so you don't run out.

Try to find all 7 hidden shapes to put into the wall.

Arrow Keys = Movement
X = Dig/Interact
Shift = Open/Close Shop
4, 5 = Select shop item
Z = Buy selected shop item
1, 2, 3 = Use shop item
